img.alt: South Holt School closed the remainder of the year.

a.span: South Holt School closed the remainder of the year.

div.p: Please read this letter and get important information about the closure of Missouri schools through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
Sometimes life is serious and sad. We've had a lot of that lately. But everyone needs to laugh, even if it is at themselves or their co-workers, or their school peeps!...
The South Holt R-1 Instructional Calendars are now available on the district's web page. Look under the link for Coronavirus Information!
Instructional Opportunities Update In response to the extension of time our school building is going to be closed due to the COVID-19 outbreak, our faculty and staff have...

div.div: Fri, Jul 31 - Sun, Aug 9 , 10:00 AM - 10:30 AM

p.a: Event: First Day of High School Fall Sports
Event: First Day of Junior High Sports

div.p: Attention juniors and seniors, check your emails about the opportunity to participate in a virtual prom tonight! It will be hosted by John Krasinski (Jim from “The Office”)!! Be sure to check it out! view image

The South Holt Board meeting Wednesday, April 15, 2020 will be held virtually from the school Library. Anyone wanting to attend virtually should contact Mr. Ottman by 4:00 tomorrow to be sent the invite and attendance information.

Beginning Friday night on April 10th, South Holt will join in with many others schools around the country and turn on our stadium lights on Friday nights at 8:20 PM, which is 20:20 military time. The lights will remain on for 20 minutes and 20 seconds to honor the class of 2020.
Important letter attached. Please read! South Holt School is closed through the remainder of 2019-2020 school year. view image

South Holt Superintendent's office will be closed Friday, April 10th and Monday April 13th for regularly scheduled Spring Break. The meals that are being delivered will still be delivered Friday and Monday.
